assetProfile.address2: Karvy Lane Road No. 11, Banjara Hills
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Rainbow Children's Medicare Limited operates a multi-specialty paediatric and obstetrics, and gynaecology hospital chain in India. The company's children's health services include general paediatrics, intensive care unit, neonatology, surgery, gastroenterology and liver diseases, haematology and oncology, psychology, pulmonology, bone marrow transplant unit, dentistry, endocrinology, nephrology, nutrition, psychiatry, ENT, anaesthesia and pain management, cardiology, radiology, physiotherapy and rehabilitation, orthopaedics, ophthalmology, dermatology, allergy, rheumatology, and plastic surgery; and laboratory, speech and language therapy, occupational therapy, paediatric and metabolic medicine, developmental and behavioural, urology, neurosurgery, infectious disease, and cranio-maxillofacial surgery; intensive care unit, kidney transplant, and cochlear implant services; and genetics and metabolic medicines paediatrics, and cerebral palsy care services. Its women's health services comprise obstetrics and gynaecology, painless delivery and labor, high risk pregnancy, pregnancy and delivery, childbirth preparation classes, vaginal birth after caesarean, breast feeding support, well women checkup, urogynaecology, pre-pregnancy health checkup, minimally invasive surgery, breast care, fetal medicine, menopausal treatment, new-born care, women's nutrition, and diabetology. The company's fertility care services include fertility treatment, ovulation induction, intracytoplasmic sperm injection treatment, investigation, intrauterine insemination, intracytoplasmic morphologically selected sperm injection, assisted hatching, cryopreservation, sperm and oocyte donor treatments, frozen embryo treatments, surgical sperm retrieval, embryo donor treatments, reproductive surgery, pre-conception counselling, and andrology and urology. It operates 15 hospitals and 3 clinics in 6 cities with a total of 1,555 beds. The company was incorporated in 1998 and is based in Hyderabad, India
